Building.Description: A office building which contains 12 space and 16 staffs.

MovementBehavior.Description: Researcher and senior 70% own office and 5% other office
Manager 55% own office and 5% other office
Sec and Admin 50% own office, 20% other office

Behavior.Description: Dark Light based on the model in Hunt, D. R. G. Predicting artificial lighting use - a method based upon observed patterns of behaviour. Light. Res. Technol. (1980).
Windows open based on Yun, GY. and Steemers, K. Time-dependent occupant behaviour models of window control in summer. Build. Environ. 43, 1471–1482 (2008).

Logit2D.Description: log(p/(1-p)) = A*P1+B*P2+C or p = exp(A*P1+B*P2+C) / { exp(A*P1+B*P2+C) + 1}

Behavior.Description: Leaving more than 6 hours Light Off
Bright Light Off when higher than 300 lux
Spring and Fall set to 22.5 deg.C
Leave more than 6 hours AC Off
Leave more than 1 hours AC Off
